response: No you can play the games without connection from your computer

context: will this wii work with my older games?
response: If they are wii games yes.

context: does anyone use them for Star Citizen, and if so how would you rate their preference?
response: I use them for both Star Citizen and Elite:Dangerous.  I really like them.  Sturdy, responsive and a good firm center detent that you can feel easily.  They do work well with shoes on, but to me are more comfortable with sock on.

context: I know that the box says "no," but will this mic work with the wii (as in not the wii u)?
response: Depends on the game.  Most games do not have support for the Wii U microphone.  I know of one specific game (Japanese WiiWare edition of Karaoke Joysound) that has gone and added the Wii U microphone support, but I'm guessing if they don't explicitly add support for it, it won't work.

context: Can I play a previous save from the original Fallout New Vegas or will I have to start over from the beginning?
response: You can most definitely use your old saves, the only difference between this game and the original release is that the DLC is included. The rest is the same. Hope this helps! :)

context: Does this come with the Reign of Giants DLC?
response: No it doesn't. But you can buy it as an add on.

context: can i use this code to pay for ps plus without registering a credit card
response: I believe so, yes. Once you have added your "funds", then simply confirm purchase inside the PS Store and your set.

context: Where do you ship from?
response: Hi friend, we ship from China

context: Does this actually work for Nintendo 3DS? Because I brought this for a replacement charger because I lost my previous one.
response: It is intended to work for Nintendo 3DS, but the one we received has faulty wiring and sometimes it charges but most times it doesn't because we can't find the exact positioning of the cord to make it work.  Ours might be that one bad one.

context: Will this work with PC?
response: It will charge through PC. In order to use the actual controller through the PC, you need the Microsoft adapter.  I bought this item and the adapter; works great. Still cheaper than buying a wired usb controller, although those are good too.

context: can i use this for pc gaming?
response: Yes you can provided you have the correct drivers, however for my controller one of the bumper buttons broke after only a few months, if you're going to be using it heavily I wouldn't recommend this controller.

context: does it work perfectly with xbox 360 controller do I have to do anything special and can I use it for a PS3 IPhone and PC??
response: I dnt recommend this at all only worked for 2 weeks couldn't really hear clear and now there oficially broke not worth at all what I paid

context: will this work on 2ds?
response: No!  The 3DS game cartridge is totally different than the 2DS.  A 3DS game will NOT fit into a 2DS system.  You can play a 2DS game on a 3DS, but not the reverse.

context: how do I get the instructions to use this control
response: Well... I guess you can set it in your "control panel". I only used it for my NBA 2K13 game, so when I plug it in, then I can set the keys in the options in the game. Hope this helps!

context: It looks as if you can play on it without taking it out of the case?  Has anyone been able to do that?
response: You probably could but my son has never attempted to

context: Hi, is this mouse blue or grey?   Thanks.

context: Does this headset work Wirelessly with the xbox one is my question.
response: Yes. The transmitter plugs into the optical port for sound and the usb for power and chat. The headset itself only has to be plugged up to charge.

context: Does the game download from the disk to my PC, or do I have to use Steam? I wont use Steam on my computer.
response: Installs from disc  *edit* that is, if you choose disc version.  If you are choosing PC Download I believe it is accomplished through Steam

context: Are the menus put in english too, or just subtitles?
response: Everything's in english. When characters talk there are subtitles because when they talk they sound like their talking in a whole new language ( its not Japanese) its kind of a mumbling sound.

context: What color are the light on top? It looks different in every picture.
response: They aren't any one color, it changes through several colors while it's on. Green, blue, red, purple, yellow... :)

context: Does this camera work with the PS Vita?
response: No.  The mini sub is not a match for the socket on the Vita.

context: Any ideas on what the special edition of the game contains?

context: Is Phantom Pain included? What does unlock bonus MGS V Phantom Pain with Ground Zeroes means?
response: I know its late but the unlocks are metal gear solid 1 solid snake skin, Ground zeros sneaking suit, Gold bionic arm, and MGS1 Gray Fox cyborg ninja skin. Also some staff will transfer depending on who you extracted like Hideo Kojima.
